SENT.plain: A female patient presented with a lump in the right parotedeal region
A needle aspiration biopsy was performed which revealed numerous monomorphous atypical lymphoid cells with PAS-negative cytoplasmic inclusions
This raised the suspicion of malignancy
Histologically, a nodular lymphoma of low grade of malignancy was diagnosed
The tumour contained many epithelioid histiocytes, sometimes with PAS-positive material
The case was difficult to classify after the Kiel-nomenclature, whilst classification on the basis of Rappaport's system was much easier
